headline: Cisco Quantum Breakthrough And AI Push Deepen Long Term Investor Debate
summary: Cisco Systems (NasdaqGS:CSCO) reports a breakthrough in quantum networking with Qunnect, achieving successful entanglement swapping over metro scale fiber. The company also unveils AI powered network and security updates, including new Silicon One chips and features focused on agentic AI security. Additional partnerships are announced to support wider AI and cloud adoption across customer networks. Cisco sits at the center of global networking, selling switches, routers, security tools, and...

headline: Wall Street Analysts Think Cisco (CSCO) Is a Good Investment: Is It?
summary: Based on the average brokerage recommendation (ABR), Cisco (CSCO) should be added to one's portfolio. Wall Street analysts' overly optimistic recommendations cast doubt on the effectiveness of this highly sought-after metric. So, is the stock worth buying?

headline: Telecom's Greenest Vendors Research Report 2026: Assessment of Sustainability Performance for 49 Telcos - Ciena, Cisco, Ericsson and Nokia Lead, While Chinese Vendors & Fiber Suppliers Lag
summary: Telcos can boost sustainability by focusing on supply chain emissions, as these account for 66% of their carbon footprint. The shift to software-centric operations and energy-efficient 5G solutions offers significant progress.
